data.comment: The match has started at Cars Jeans Stadion.
Alkmaar take a 0-1 lead thanks to Albert Gudmundsson.
In the minute 33, Dani De Wit with an assist there.
The first-half is over at Cars Jeans Stadion.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Vicente Besuijen is replacing Amar Catic for Den Haag at Cars Jeans Stadion.
Kees de Boer (Den Haag) gets a yellow card.
The home team have replaced Kees de Boer with Ilay Elmkies. This is the second substitution made today by Aleksandar Rankovic.
In the minute 60, Dani De Wit is booked for the away team.
Milan van Ewijk grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Cars Jeans Stadion.
Great play from John Goossens to set up the goal.
In the minute 66, Jesper Karlsson puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
The home team replace Jonas Arweiler with Nikos Karelis.
Aleksandar Rankovic is making the team's fourth substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Michiel Kramer replacing John Goossens.
In the minute 82, Den Haag make their fifth substitution with Ravel Morrison replacing David Lennart Philipp.
Arne Slot (Alkmaar) is making a first substitution, with Ramon Leeuwin replacing Albert Gudmundsson.
Goal! Michiel Kramer equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In the minute 87, Milan van Ewijk instrumental with a fine assist.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Vicente Besuijen (Den Haag) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
